data.title: Chris Penn
data.text:
AKA Christopher Shannon Penn

Born: 10-Oct-1965

Birthplace: Burbank, CA

Died: 24-Jan-2006

Location of death: Santa Monica, CA

Cause of death: Heart Failure

Remains: Buried, Holy Cross Cemetery, Culver City, CA

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Nice Guy Eddie in Reservoir Dogs

Father: Leo Penn (actor, b. 27-Aug-1921, d. 5-Sep-1998)

Mother: Eileen Ryan (actress, b. 16-Oct-1928)

Brother: Michael Penn (musician, b. 1-Aug-1958)

Brother: Sean Penn (actor, b 17-Aug-1960)

Girlfriend: Tai Babilonia (figure skater, dated 1985)

Girlfriend: Stefianna de la Cruz (ex)

High School: Santa Monica High School, Santa Monica, CA (expelled)

Expelled from School

Unlawful Possession of a Firearm Santa Monica, CA (Aug-1999)

Driving with a Suspended License Santa Monica, CA (Aug-1999)

Driving While Intoxicated twice

Reckless Driving

Died Intestate

Autopsy

Irish Ancestry Maternal

Lithuanian Ancestry Paternal

Russian Ancestry Paternal

Jewish Ancestry Paternal

Risk Factors: Obesity, Alcoholism, Cocaine, Marijuana

TELEVISION

The Brotherhood of Poland, New Hampshire Waylon Shaw (2003)
